abstract.t: The Real-Time Communication in WEB-browsers (RTCWeb) working group is charged to provide protocol support for direct interactive rich communication using audio, video, and data between two peers' web- browsers. This document specifies the non-media data transport aspects of the RTCWeb framework. It provides an architectural overview of how the Stream Control Transmission Protocol (SCTP) is used in the RTCWeb context as a generic transport service allowing WEB-browsers to exchange generic data from peer to peer.
